data.name: Sample - Microsoft Graph API - 2.2.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Microsoft Graph API" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Delete Message Bulk
workflows.description: Deletes messages from multiple users mailboxes in Azure based on the comma-separated list of users you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Graph API: Delete Message Bulk

workflows.name: Update Security Alert
workflows.description: Updates a specific alert using Microsoft Graph API based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Graph API: Update Security Alert

workflows.name: Create IP Named Location
workflows.description: Creates a new IP named location in Azure based on specified input parameter.

arguments.title: Microsoft Graph API: Create IP Named Location

workflows.name: Add Comment on Security Alert
workflows.description: Add a comment to an existing alert based on the specified alert ID.

arguments.title: Microsoft Graph API: Add Comment on Security Alert

workflows.name: Get Risky Users List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all risky users from Microsoft Graph API.

arguments.title: Microsoft Graph API: Get Risky Users List

workflows.name: Get All Named Locations
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of named location from Azure based on display name, sort order, and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Graph API: Get All Named Locations

workflows.name: Get Users Within A Group
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of users within a specific group from Microsoft Graph API based on the group ID you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Graph API: Get Users Within A Group

routes.name: Start-> Get Users Within A Group

workflows.name: Block New IP Ranges
workflows.description: Blocks IPv4 and IPv6 address ranges in specified NamedLocation in Azure.

arguments.title: Microsoft Graph API: Block New IP Ranges

workflows.name: Get Risky User Details
workflows.description: Retrieve details for a specific risky user from Microsoft Graph API based on the user ID you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Graph API: Get Risky User Details

workflows.name: Revoke User Session
workflows.description: Invalidates all the refresh tokens issued to applications for a user.

arguments.title: Microsoft Graph API: Revoke User Session

workflows.name: Delete Message
workflows.description: Deletes a specific message from the specific user's mailbox in Azure based on the user ID and message ID you have specified.

workflows.name: Unblock IP Ranges
workflows.description: Unblocks IPv4 and IPv6 address ranges in specified NamedLocation in Azure.

arguments.title: Microsoft Graph API: Unblock IP Ranges

workflows.name: Get Security Alert
workflows.description: Retrieves details of a specific alert from Microsoft Graph API based on the alert ID you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Graph API: Get Security Alert

workflows.name: Get Groups
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of groups from Microsoft Graph API.

workflows.name: Search Message in Users Mailbox
workflows.description: Searches for messages in a user's mailbox within an organization based on the Subject and user list you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Graph API: Search Message in Users Mailbox

routes.name: Start-> Search Message in Users Mailbox

workflows.name: Get All Security Alerts
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of alerts from Microsoft Graph API based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Graph API: Get All Security Alerts
